text: Melipotis contorta is a species of moth in the family Erebidae. It is found from Florida,mothphotographersgroup through Mexico and Guatemala to Brazil. It is also found in Cuba, St. Thomas, Hispaniola, Puerto Rico, Martinique, Saint Martin, St. Kitts, Antigua and Barbuda and Jamaica.nkis.info Adults are on wing from January to February, in May, July and December in Florida.Bug Guide ==References== contorta Category:Moths of the Caribbean Category:Moths of Central America Category:Moths of Cuba Category:Moths of Guadeloupe Category:Moths of Mexico Category:Lepidoptera of Jamaica Category:Insects of Antigua and Barbuda Category:Insects of Puerto Rico Category:Insects of the Dominican Republic Category:Moths described in 1887
title: Melipotis contorta
